summary: Leisureflies Travels Pvt Ltd luxury travel lead generation website with SEO optimization, country-specific destination images, INR pricing, company details, and chat functionality
architectural_notes: Lead generation website structure for luxury travel company
Multi-location business (Chandigarh corp office + Panchkula branch)
IATA-accredited and TAAI-certified company (founded 2010, 53,000+ travelers served)
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Dubai skyline with Burj Khalifa at sunset for UAE destination card (dubai-skyline.dim_800x600.png)
- Desert safari with sand dunes and 4x4 vehicles for UAE packages (dubai-desert-safari.dim_800x600.png)
- Santorini white buildings with blue domes overlooking Aegean Sea for Greece destination (greece-santorini.dim_800x600.png)
- Athens Acropolis and Parthenon temple for Greece packages (greece-acropolis.dim_800x600.png)
- Paris Eiffel Tower with Seine river for France destination card (france-eiffel.dim_800x600.png)
- Swiss Alps mountain landscape with snow peaks and green valleys for Switzerland destination (switzerland-alps.dim_800x600.png)
- Maldives overwater bungalows with turquoise lagoon for beach destination (maldives-resort.dim_800x600.png)
- Thailand temples and Buddhist architecture for Southeast Asia packages (thailand-temple.dim_800x600.png)

existing_features.title: Add a live chat widget or chat tab that allows visitors to initiate customer communication directly from the website
Implement SEO optimization for the lead generation website including meta tags, structured data, Open Graph tags, and semantic HTML
Update destination images to be country-specific and contextually accurate (e.g., no desert safari images for European destinations)
Convert all pricing display from USD to INR currency format throughout the website
Update the complete company name to 'Leisureflies Travels Pvt Ltd' (or 'LEISUREFLIES TRAVELS PRIVATE LIMITED' where formal) across all branding touchpoints
Add comprehensive contact details including corporate office (Chandigarh), branch office (Panchkula), departmental phone numbers, and email addresses to the Contact page

Update the About Us page with the complete company profile including full service description, client focus, strengths, IATA/TAAI certifications, founding story (2010, Mr. Kamal Rana), and milestone of 53,000+ travelers served

new_feature_requests.summary: SEO optimization for lead generation website
Country-specific destination images (no desert safari pics for Europe, etc.)
Add complete company contact details (corp office, branch, departmental contacts)
Add chat option/tab for customer communication
Include full company profile and About Us section
